Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text: Restaurant with a fantastic atmosphere located at a top location in the hearth of the city center of Amsterdam, super friendly staff, delicious tapas with the real Spanish flavors. Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text:
We ate delicious tapas at Tia Rosa in Amsterdam. They also have special Spanish wines and beers.
For dessert we had a cocktail. I will come here more often & nice terrace at the canal!

Review Text:

Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text: Good food and nice service you can at this place. The sangria is surprisingly good. Not a lot off space outside but inside is cosy.

Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text: I tasted a really nice cocktail and some delicious croquettes! Nice place to visit, I preferred the outside tables on the Canal.

Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text: Great tapas, cosy inside, nice house wine.  Ate almost everything on the menu over the span of a few days, everything was fresh, well prepared and delicious.  Definitely recommend.

Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text: Amazing! Food is absolutely delicious and restaurant itself is beautiful. Highly recommend!

Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text: Service is a total disgrace. Staff is rude and super slow. I wouldn't recommend this place at all.

Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text: The place had friendly staff working there, which were mainly dutch. The decor in the restaurant was nice and it had a lively atmosphere. However, did not remind me of tapas and for the price I could get a better deal at a hotel restaurant. Overall, 3 stars from me, its worth a try.

Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text: Food coma! This place is great. Prime location and great food. Not expensive. Great atmosphere. The service was super friendly and fun. They have good wine a and a good variety of tapas. We will definitely come here again. Highly recommended tapas restaurant.

Name: Tia Rosa
Review Text: Spanish chefs, means real Spanish taste! Been there a few times, never disappointed. The service is fast and friendly, all what we like when going to a restaurant! The place is frequented by local people too, that is good sign :)

Name: Tia Rosa

Name: Tia Rosa

Name: Tia Rosa

Review Text: Nice environment, and nice staff. However, they sell something as being tipically Spanish, but that needs a bit of an improvement. I never saw cheese on the side of a Spanish tortilla, only here. Much too small portions, and quite expensive as well. However, the cooking is good.

Name: Tia Rosa
